ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: MCDB 570 01 is a class about some of the current techniques and topics that are exploited by biotechnology and pharmaceutical companies. Along with the techniques and topics are the though process in how to apply these techniques in order to solve a problem and think about the pros and cons of one technique over another. I would recommend this course to another student because if you are interested in biotechnology this course gives students what techniques and topics are currently being researched in the biotechnology field.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This helped me by expanding my knowledge of the different techniques available to solve many different problems as well as expanding my thought process to come up with the different possible solutions to solve a problem.
